original_title: The 4th Annual Howie Mandel Stand-Up Extravaganza
overview: Featuring some of the hottest comedians today including Amanda Seales, Maz Jobrani, Lil Rel Howery, Laurie Kimlartin, Garfunkel and Oates, and many others. Hosted by Howie Mandel and recorded at the Just For Laughs Festival in Montreal.
title: The 4th Annual Howie Mandel Stand-Up Extravaganza
